Yuzlab xonandalarga xit qo‘shiqlar yozib bergan shoir Mirzo Karim uysiz yashamoqda (foto+video)

07 Nov 2019, 15:24

“Orangizda onam bo‘lsaydi”, “Dadamga ichirmanglar”, “Yoshlik bizni tashlab ketadi”, “Jayra-jayra”, “Dadamning muxlislari” kabi yuzlab ommalashgan qo‘shiqlarning muallifi, shoir Mirzo Karim uysiz yashayotgani, oilasi va farzandlari bilan o‘n yillardan buyon ijara uylarda sarson bo‘lib yurgani haqida ijtimoiy tarmoqlarda ma’lumotlar tarqaldi.


Foto: Facebook

Ushbu ma’lumotlarga oydinlik kiritish maqsadida “Daryo” muxbiri Feruz Muhammad shoir Mirzo Karimning ijara uyida mehmon bo‘ldi.



Shoir Mirzo Karim hozirgi ahvoli haqida quyidagilarni gapirib berdi.
Odam yaxshi yashagisi keladi, kimgadir uch-to‘rtta uyi, mashinasi bo‘lsa ham kamdek tuyuladi. Ahvolim, kimlargadir nisbatan yaxshi emas. Albatta, o‘zimiz yaxshilashga harakat qilyapmiz. 2018-yilgacha buzilsa uy beradigan qaror bo‘lar edi. Ya’ni propiskada turgan uyi buzilsa uy berishardi, men o‘sha eski uyda o‘n yil turib umrimni o‘tkazdim. O‘n yil shunga ishondim. Boshqa bir san’atkor do‘stimga yoki tadbirkor do‘stimga ishonmadim. Men avvalo Xudoga ishondim.Ahvolim ham u qadar ayanchli emas. Negaki, men yashayapman, nafas olayapman, oilam, farzandlarim bor. Afg‘onistondan sog‘-salomat kelganman. Buyog‘i hammasi peshonamdan, ruschasiga aytganda ‘lotereya’ deyman, shuning uchun men ko‘nikuvchan odamman.Mirzo Karim, shoir

Mirzo Karim suhbat davomida va’dasida turmagan san’atkor do‘stlarini ham eslab o‘tdi.

Ko‘p aldashgan, hali ham aldashadi. Diskim chiqsa, uy olib beraman, mashina olib beraman, kitob chiqarab beraman, dorixona ochib beraman deyishadi. O‘n yillab birga ishlagan hamkorlarimiz ham gapirgan, aytadi ham, qaytadi ham. Men bulardan hech qachon umid ham qilmaganman.O‘zimga hamma she’rim ham mashhur tuyuladi. Xalq orasida qanchalik mashhur ekanligini san‘atkorlar ham, xalq ham biladi. Ozodbek Nazarbekov ‘Orangizda onam bo‘lsaydi’ she’rimni kuylagan. Xurshid Rasulov 100 dan ortiq she’rlarimni qo‘shiq qilib aytgan. Hali bitta ham qo‘shig‘i yo‘q paytlarida, ijodini noldan boshlaganmiz. O‘shanda, Xurshid Rasulovning jamoasida to‘ylarda davrakash bo‘lib yurganman. Shunga yarasha, xizmat haqqi olganman. Orzularimiz ko‘p edi, lekin, birortasi ham amalga oshmadi. Hech qaysi san’atkorning mendan qarzi yo‘q, lekin, qanaqadir mehr-oqibat, ‘shu inson menga jon kuydirgan ekan’, degan nuqtayi nazardan aytyapman. Hammasi bilan ko‘rishsam ham, birortasi bilan teskari bo‘lmaganman, bundan keyin ham ‘she’r yozib ber’ deyishsa, yozib beraveraman. Shunday bo‘lganki, o‘zlari va’da berib, o‘zlari va’dasini bajarishmagan, keyin boshqalarga murojaat qilishga majbur bo‘lganman.Xonandalar qalam haqi ham berishgan, qalam haqi ham shundayki, qaysidir ma’noda u choychaqa. Agarda necha pulligini aytish zarur bo‘lsa, 50 dollar va undan ko‘proq berishadi. Yulduz opa bilan ishlaganman, ularga ham juda ko‘p qo‘shiq yozib berganman. Birga ishlagan qo‘shiqlarimiz ham bor. O‘shanda ‘Panterra’ studiyasida qo‘l qo‘yib, xuddi oylik olgandek olganmiz.Boya aytganimdek, hech qaysi xonandaning mendan qarzi yo‘q, lekin, juda ko‘pchiligida bergan va’dasi, odamni ishontirib qo‘yishi bor. Bittasi endi, ismini aytmayman, katta yo‘lda mashinani to‘xtatib ‘Bitta o‘g‘ilman, birinchi diskim chiqsa, mashina mendan’,  degandi. Menga boshqalari ham aytishgan, va’dalar berishgan. Valohanki, 3—4 ta disk chiqardi, 5—6 ta mashina oldi, lekin eslatsangiz, ‘U bo‘lib qoldi, bu bo‘lib qoldi, unday-bunday’, — deyishadi.Avvalo, Xudo, keyin esa o‘z kuchimga ishonaman. Qachondir, bizga ham haqni, xalqni ham nazari tushishini umid qilib yashayman. Bu narsalarga chuqurlashib, ‘mana shunaqa mehnatlar qilgan edim, e’zozlashmadi’, degan gaplardan juda-juda yiroqman.Mirzo Karim, shoir

Mirzo Karim, who has written hundreds of hits to hundreds of singers, lives homeless (photo + video)

07 Nov 2019, 15:24

Poet Mirzo Karim, the author of hundreds of popular songs such as "I have a mother among you", "Don't drink my dad", "Youth abandons us", "Jayra-jayra", "My dad's fans". Social media has reported that rental housing has been shaken for years.


Photo: Facebook

To clarify this information, Feruz Muhammad, a correspondent of the river, visited the rental house of the poet Mirzo Karim.



The poet Mirzo Karim spoke about his present condition.
The man wants to live well, it seems that he has three or four houses and a car. My condition is not good for anyone. Of course, we are trying to improve ourselves. By 2018, homeownership would be a decision. That is, if a propiska house was demolished, I would spend ten years in that old house. I believed it for ten years. I did not trust another artist friend or business friend. I believed in God first. My situation is not so bad. I live, breathe, I have family and children. I came from Afghanistan safely. Everything is on my forehead, and in Russian I say 'lottery', so I'm a good person. Mirza Karim, poet

In the course of the interview, Karim Karim also mentioned his friends who were not artists.

Many cheated, still cheating. When I get a drive, I get a house, get a car, give it a book, open a drugstore. Our co-workers who have been together for decades have spoken, will tell, and come back. I never expected it. All my poems seem popular. Artists and people know how popular they are. Ozodbek Nazarbekov sang my poem "I will be your mother". Khurshid Rasulov sang more than 100 of my poems. We started off from scratch when there were no songs. At that time I used to be in the band for Khurshid Rasulov. Accordingly, I received a service fee. We had a lot of dreams, but none of them came true. No artist owes me anything, but somehow I kind of say, 'This guy really cared about me'. Although I have seen it all, I did not disagree with it, and I will continue to write if they say, 'Write a poem'. As it is, they have made promises and did not do their own thing, and then had to turn to others. They'll give you $ 50 or more if you have to say how much. I worked with the Star Sisters and wrote a lot of songs for them. We also have songs that we have worked with. Then we signed up for the 'Panther' studio and got it as a salary. One of them, I won't name it, stopped the car on the highway and said, 'My son, when the first drive comes out of the car'. Others have been told of me and given gifts. There are 3-4 discs and 5-6 cars, but if you recall, they'd say, "He's gone, it's gone, it's like this." I believe I hope that someday we will see both the truth and the people. Deep in these things, I am far from saying, 'I have done so, and have not been disrespectful.'
